name: Splitter (bluwspell)
description:
World is in danger because of somethng like a ball,  even developer don't know what it is,  trying to annihilate humanity, I mean cubenity (because  it is cube game).

You have to destroy them with your spirit and don't ever think of loosing to other cubes. you are the hero not them. you have to destroy these balls before anyone else claim it.

Get the highest score and save the world or not (because there is no ending in this game)

[Features]
- Three different modes you can play.
- 9 maps you can buy and play with.
- 5 different skills you can unlock by buying new map. You can only have one skill at one time.
- Endless gameplay.

[How to  play]
- Space to shoot.
- Move left and right with A and D buttons.
- Jump with W button.
- If you have a spell you can click S button to activate it.
